ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bind Poll
ygData.msgSnippet: I was thinking South Ro as opposed to Innothoule.  I do think we will see a bind point for Dark races up north, maybe in BlackBurrow?  A bind point in North
ygData.messageBody:
I was thinking South Ro as opposed to Innothoule. I do think we will see a
bind point for Dark races up north, maybe in BlackBurrow? A bind point in
North Karana at the gypsy camp might work too.

In Kunark I'm not sure. Binding there is annoying but I don't see any
obvious places for it to be added. Something near Kaesora would seem
logical as that place is a ghost town most nights.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2001 10:43 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bind Poll


Pretty close to my guesses. Though I'm betting no on the Innothule, Feerot
ones...
Iagree on Lavastorm, South Karana, Dagnor's Cauldron.

I think they may add a coule in Kunark too, outside Kaesora and Droga
(Field of Bone and Frontier Mts)
